entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
